column1: Little Goat Diner////This was a recommended hot spot by friends who are currently living in Chicago. During my visit here this past weekend
column2: I was impressed. We had reservations for 11:30am and after bolting from Chicago O'hare
column3: we used the convenient valet in front and even after arriving 10 minutes later than our reservation
column4: we were shown our seats immediately. My friends ordered french toast and pancake entrees
column6: I have a severe egg allergy and upon informing the server
column7: she brought out a separate vegan menu for me. The crumpets were divine and the home fries were great for sharing. I can't wait to come back!
